class.name: slg_bt_plugins/IsStopGesture
class.description: Returns SUCCESS if blackboard port 'is_stop_gesture' is true.

class.name: slg_bt_plugins/IsFaceDetected
class.description: Returns SUCCESS if blackboard port 'is_face_detected' is true.

class.name: slg_bt_plugins/TurnTowardFace
class.description: Commands the robot to rotate toward the detected face.

class.name: slg_bt_plugins/CancelNavToPose
class.description: Cancels a Nav2 action goal by calling <action_name>/_action/cancel_goal (action_msgs/srv/CancelGoal).

class.name: slg_bt_plugins/FgsTopicToBlackboard
class.description: Takes data from the FGS topic and writes it to blackboard ports.

class.name: slg_bt_plugins/DumpBlackboardData
class.description: Prints selected blackboard key/value pairs to the console.
